Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have searched on Google and here on the forums but I can't find how to delete bodies from the game. I have found several guides about adding new bodies or editing existing ones but nothing about how to delete them, lets say I want a game with just Kerbin and the Mun, how can I achieve that?

Thanks a lot!
You need to use !Body[nameofbody]. !Body[Minmus] would remove Minmus.
As off topic as it is - I just couldn't help but think of this when reading this thread
